mapper.select:
select
from car WHERE car_status = 2 ORDER BY create_at DESC
select count(1) from car where delete_at is null

select
from car where user_uuid=#{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND brand IS NOT NULL AND car_status=2

select
from car where delete_at is null
and model_character like CONCAT('%', #{modelCharacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by create_at asc
order by create_at desc
limit #{start},#{end}

select count(1) from car where delete_at is null
and model_character like CONCAT('%', #{modelCharacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select
from car where delete_at is null and car_name like CONCAT('%', #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
